thread.title: 5 Outfits to Wear No Matter What Your Plans Are For Super Bowl Sunday
thread.title_full: 5 Outfits to Wear No Matter What Your Plans Are For Super Bowl Sunday

author: Hannah Weil McKinley
title: 5 Outfits to Wear No Matter What Your Plans Are For Super Bowl Sunday
text: What to Wear to a Football Game 5 Outfits to Wear No Matter What Your Plans Are For Super Bowl Sunday January 30, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 5 Outfits to Wear No Matter What Your Plans Are For Super Bowl Sunday No matter which team you root for during football season, your real loyalty lies with your sense of style. Sure, there's nothing wrong with wearing your favorite jersey and some serious face paint , but if you're looking for an outfit that can take you from game day to date night, look no further. Whether you're cheering from the sidelines or your sofa, the five different looks ahead put a fashion-forward spin on football style. — Additional reporting by Marina Liao 33814815,40099369 Around The Web What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! 0 Reactions Sign Up For Our Newsletter Select topics that interest you Celebrity Style bill14987016 3 years You seriously expect me to pay $1600 to look like I went shopping at a thrift store? Do you really think that people are that stupid? Sorry, most women are smart enough to know that no matter how much we like football, our men go to the games to watch the game. They don't want to be distracted, which is why we should either find something else to do or, if we are fans ourselves, go to the game with our football loving girlfriends. Either way, we are not going to pay $1600 to dress up like a wino. Bwahahahahaha 3 years Oh, Leah...What fantasy land do you live in? Not a chance for distraction from football. Yeah...that army parka gets me turned on... The only distraction is the two seconds it takes to say "get out of my life" when I see you're dumb enough to waste $1649 for that crap. I like my women smart, including when it comes to money. Jason14979562 3 years That Outfit is ridiculous. My eyes will still be glued to the game, the only way my girl can get me away from the game is if she strips down naked and flash her boobs and ass in my face, then there is a 10% chance I might stop watching the game.
